item.title: How to Get an Instance of IServiceProvider in .NET
item.description: In modern .NET applications, dependency injection is a fundamental design pattern that promotes loose coupling and enhances maintainability. At the center of .NET’s dependency injection system lies the IServiceProvider interface, which acts as a service locator for retrieving service instances. Understanding how to obtain and work with an IServiceProvider instance is vital for developers who […] The post How to Get an Instance of IServiceProvider in .NET appeared first on Code Maze.

item.title: Entity Framework Core Best Practices
item.description: Entity Framework Core (EF Core) is an object-relational mapper (ORM), enabling us to work with a database using .NET objects, eliminating much of the data-access code we usually need to write. EF Core supports many databases, including SQL Server, SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and more, making it highly versatile. While EF Core provides many conveniences, following […] The post Entity Framework Core Best Practices appeared first on Code Maze. Link to article: https://code-maze.
